To cite `repDiagnosis` in publications, please use the following references:

```bibtex
@Manual{your-package,
  title = {repDiagnosis: Diagnostics for Replication Studies},
  author = {Ying Jin and Kevin Guo and Dominik Rothenhäusler},
  year = {2023},
  note = {R package version 0.0.1},
  url = {https://github.com/yourusername/repDiagnosis},
}

@Article{your-paper,
  title = {Title of Your Related Paper},
  author = {Ying Jin and Kevin Guo and Dominik Rothenhäusler},
  journal = {Journal Name},
  year = {2023},
```
